description: This elegant linguine dish is a restaurant quality dish at home.
name: Prawn, Lemon & Spinach Linguine Recipe | Woolworths

recipeInstructions.text: Bring a pan of water to the boil and cook the linguine for 7 minutes, add the peas and cook for 2 more minutes. Drain, reserving 4 tablespoons of starchy water, and set aside.

Add a drizzle of oil to the pan and return the linguine and peas, reducing the heat to low. Stir in the garlic and spinach and cook for 2-3 minutes, until wilted. Add the creme fraiche, parmesan, lemon zest and juice and the starchy water.
Stir in the prawns and half of the parsley and cook for 1 minute to heat through. Serve with the rest of the parsley on top and a drizzle of olive oil.
